      • registerByName

        public NCMBUser registerByName(java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String password)
                        throws NCMBException
        Register new user by name
        パラメータ:
        userName - user name
        password - password
        戻り値:
        new NCMBUser object that registered
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend
